title: NAPAS Domestic Card
subTitle: OAuth 2.0, MFA, and data encryption
content: NAPAS domestic cards issued by banks/financial companies include Debit Card, Prepaid Card, and Domestic Credit Card. NAPAS cards are easily identifiable with the logo on the lower right corner and a sequence of card numbers starting with 9704.
summary: NAPAS domestic cards issued by banks/financial companies include Debit Card, Prepaid Card, and Domestic Credit Card. NAPAS cards are easily identifiable with the logo on the lower right corner and a sequence of card numbers starting with 9704.
name: NAPAS Domestic Card
features: Pay for goods and services at card-accepting units (online, offline)
Transfer/internal transfer via interbank 247
Withdrawal 247 interbank via NAPAS system
Print statements
Change PIN code

title: NAPAS FastFund 247 Service
subTitle: <200ms response time for 95% of transactions
content: NAPAS FastFund 247 is a service provided by NAPAS to member banks, payment intermediaries, and money transfer service providers allowing customers to use their card or account banks to transfer and receive money immediately through the following means and transaction channels
summary: NAPAS FastFund 247 Service provided by NAPAS to Banks, Payment Intermediaries and Payment service providers, allowing customers to use cards or bank accounts to transfer and receive money immediately anytime, anywhere.
name: NAPAS FastFund 247 Service
features: VietQR standard complies with EMV Co.’s QR Payment standard and the Basic standard practice for QR codes issued by the State Bank.
Quick transactions/Simplifying customers’ experience and increasing payment speed by scanning QR codes, instead of selecting and inputting information as usual.
Customers are able to create their own QR codes using bank accounts issued by over 50 NAPAS’ member banks.
Making transactions anywhere, anytime, even outside office hours and during weekends, as long as each transaction is under 500 million VND.

title: NAPAS FastFund 247 with  VietQR Service
subTitle: Fast money transfer via VietQR code
content: NAPAS FastFund 247 with VietQR service allows customers to transfer money from their own accounts to an account of any other NAPAS member banks by scanning VietQR codes, using the same method as NAPAS FastFund 247 service. Customers are allowed to make transactions of under 500 million VND.
summary: NAPAS FastFund 247 with VietQR Service allows customers to proceed transactions with other accounts issued by any NAPAS member banks anywhere, anytime simply by scanning individual QR payment codes.
name: NAPAS FastFund 247 with  VietQR Service
features: VietQR standard complies with EMV Co.’s QR Payment standard and the Basic standard practice for QR codes issued by the State Bank.
Quick transactions/Simplifying customers’ experience and increasing payment speed by scanning QR codes, instead of selecting and inputting information as usual.
Customers are able to create their own QR codes using bank accounts issued by over 50 NAPAS’ member banks.
Making transactions anywhere, anytime, even outside office hours and during weekends, as long as each transaction is under 500 million VND.

title: Digital Payment Platform
subTitle: Digital Payment Platform.
content: NAPAS DPP is a technical infrastructure for connecting, transmitting and processing electronic data of NAPAS's online payment transactions. NAPAS DPP connects customers and payment acceptance units with banks, foreign bank branches, financial companies licensed to issue credit cards, and payment intermediary service providers to support customers in making payments in e-commerce transactions, electronic bill payments and other electronic payment services.
name: Payments
features: Pay by card/account
Pay/top up by card token/account token
Pay by VietQRPay code
Pay by Bank/Payment Intermediary application
Pay by ApplePay
3DS authentication solution

title: Open Banking
subTitle: Open Banking
content: NAPAS provides an Open Banking solution based on a centralized connection model, acting as a trusted bridge between data-holding organizations (DPs) such as banks, e-wallets, credit institutions and third parties (TPPs). Through this secure infrastructure, TPPs can access account information with user consent, thereby developing personalized value-added services. The solution is built on international experience and practical needs in Vietnam, aiming at an open, scalable and highly compatible financial data sharing platform, while ensuring full compliance with regulations on security, data sharing and privacy. NAPAS issues a set of unified technical, legal and operational standards, helping to simplify integration, increase interoperability and promote flexible deployment of new services.
name: Accounts
features: Single connection, unified standard: Optimize Open API deployment with one connection, one common standard.
Flexible roles: Support 02 roles of Data Provider (DP) and Third Party Provider (TPP) simultaneously.
AIS – Account information query: Provide balance, account details, transaction history quickly and accurately.
PIS – Convenient payment: Initiate money transfer transactions, query status and cancel transactions easily.
